name: ALING NENA'S KARINDERYA
description:
Mabuhay! Welcome to Aling Nena's Karinderya!

Family drama happens… (typical Filipino family). All that’s left with Aling Nena and her son Brian are dues and debts. Brian, responsible at a very young age, has decided to step up and take some of the load her mom is carrying To do this, Brian must manage his mom’s karinderya and earn enough to pay back all their debts and dues. 

          Join Brian as he goes on a journey in making his mom proud. Prepare ingredients, cook dishes, serve customers, wash plates, refill ulams, and make sure everything is up and running smoothly.

Genre

Aling Nena’s Karinderya is a strategy video game focused on time management. The player would need to manage resources and tasks in order to achieve a certain goal.
